Tk_Gui

Class Tk_MainWindow.CloseAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.event.WindowAdapter
      • Tk_Gui.Tk_MainWindow.CloseAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.WindowFocusListener, java.awt.event.WindowListener, java.awt.event.WindowStateListener, java.util.EventListener
    Enclosing class:
    Tk_MainWindow

     class Tk_MainWindow.CloseAdapter
extends java.awt.event.WindowAdapter
    A Window Adapter to catch the windowClosing event, and, if the user confirms the close operation, get any remaining task time records from the m_start panel, and write them to the Tk_History.xml file.
    Author:
    michaelwebster

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Tk_MainWindow.CloseAdapter() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void windowClosing(java.awt.event.WindowEvent e)
      Catch the window closing event, display a confirmation dialog, and if window closing is confirmed, grab any remaining time records from m_start, and write them back to the Tk_History file.
